definitions.definition: Anything added to something in order to stiffen it, such as a support beam, or starch for a collar.
One of a series of angle bars , Z-bars , beams , rods , or other shapes , attached in order to provide them the necessary stiffness or rigidity .
An alcoholic drink taken to fortify oneself.

main_definition: Anything added to something in order to stiffen it, such as a support beam, or starch for a collar.
secondary_definitions: ( construction ) One of a series of angle bars , Z-bars , beams , rods , or other shapes , attached in order to provide them the necessary stiffness or rigidity .
( slang ) An alcoholic drink taken to fortify oneself.
